name: mpc-js-web
description: A javascript client library for the Music Player Daemon - web browser package

scripts.prepublish: rm -Rf lib umd && npm run-script build
scripts.build: tsc && mkdir -p umd && webpack --entry ./lib/mpc.js --mode=production --output-library MPC --output-library-type umd --output-path umd --output-filename mpc.min.js
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Holger Benl <hbenl@evandor.de>
